name: deimosrising
text: It's a good question. Am I?

name: sidd2600
text: homegrown

name: sargasm
text: Some questions were not meant to be answered.  Like this one.

name: tasteful
text: no this is definitely worth answering

name: pigeon_street
text: Was this question meant to be answered?

name: caseyb3
text: The answer may shock you.

name: tekende
text: Five dollars.

name: history
text: In fact, Todd needs 6 more dollars to reveal Rays' secret...of nakedness.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Maybe I am naked and I don't even know it!

name: perhapsmaybe
text: I am naked

name: ghostd
text: Well, thank goodness there is a website which can properly address this mystery!

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: ooohhh, the things I learn about through this comic!

name: overmedicated
text: Oooohh, these knives!

name: epicurus
text: I am naked.

name: tetrisattack
text: I hope that anyone who goes to that site answers the questions about if the people in the pictures are actually naked or not. There's no need for lying on the Internet.

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "Yesterday's strip ends differently."

name: idsyen
text: So, the previous strip had a different ending on the day it was posted? Does anyone remember what it was?

name: toughasnails001
text: Show of hands: who went to the site after reading this? I did.

name: windex
text: I will have to check out the site when I get home!

name: dovey
text: That site is pretty stupid.

name: i_love_kate
text: A mystery. Was Toughasnails the actual first handfaceposter?

name: sardoniclaconic
text:
I believe it was Heccibigs, actually.
I'm looking for this in the archives but I'll probably get tired before I find it.

name: i_love_kate
text: Man, I know she inspired the weekend. I just have earlier memories of seeing comments by toughasnails with that avatar.

name: sardoniclaconic
text: I'm pretty sure that's actually one of the avatars generated by the site, because there are lots of other people who have it.

name: sardoniclaconic
text: (I only know this because I got bored and was browsing the members)

name: zapatos
text: (because i was looking for my parents)

name: heccibiggs
text: Man do you know how nuts it is to come across yourself being discussed.

name: landowmpg
text: It must... It must feel wonderful.

name: i_love_kate
text: This must be how Michael Jackson feels when he approaches a blank search engine.

name: evolume
text: I'm at work and not naked... yet...

name: evolume
text:
WOAH!
AmINakedOrNot.com = NOT SAFE FOR WORK!!

name: closefriend
text: It certainly seems like there's only one answer to the question.

name: hateandwar
text: It's actually a little more complicated than that. There are some that'll make you think. In the end, your determinations as to what constitutes naked will reveal deep and meaningful secrets you did not know you were keeping from yourself.

name: bixschmix
text: You know, I wasn't going to go there. Until I read that comment. Now I'm just too damn curious to resist.

name: dracer2
text:
You're not wrong, you know.

-Is the girl wearing only shoes naked?
-Is the girl who has no clothes on per-se, but has a sort of sheer cloth draped across her breasts, naked?
-The girl who is not wearing anything but is covering her nipples with her hands - is she naked?

name: philosophe
text:
Not a 5, but a 4 just for the strip title: No porno! Wait. Some porno.

I really want to hear Ray say that when he's planning how to turn a mother out.

name: trevor
text: I looked down and was surprised with what I found.

name: godfatherofsouls
text:
Thank you, AmINaked.

you are the

web site of the week.

name: landowmpg
text: It is indeed difficult to type with your left hand.

name: rowboat
text: A comment left by rowboat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Tony, envika, catgrl131)

name: crumpetsandtea
text: i am naked under my clothes ;)

name: melloclello
text: Goodness. Turns out I'm the fifty-thousandth viewer of this strip.

name: jhunter
text: This site performs a valuable public service. I'd be wasting valuable seconds by looking down. Plus, what if I looked too fast? I'd get whiplash!
